name: places/ChIJF1-NNBH2wokR8wTZjL1Ecrc
formattedAddress: 227 W 116th St, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 227 W 116th St, New York, NY 10026-2410, USA

originalText.text: I came to get my cracked screen replaced but besides that, the phone worked. Once it was "fixed" I noticed that night that it wasn't consistently recognizing my finger, it would type messages by itself and the screen would shake. I then noticed that my front facing camera wasn't working. The screen would freeze or go black. I returned to the store expecting them to fix it. The technician told me 30 minutes, I waited a hour and it was returned to be fix. I got no further than the front door when I checked and the camera was still not working. I was told to come back and wait more. Maybe I would buy a case here or a pair of cheap headphones but their customer service needs serious work. They could do better communicating with their customers. I would a case or headphones or something for them but I wish I did more research before asking them to repair my screen.

originalText.text:
Horrible. I bought a phone here out of desperation. The return policy was the perfect amount of time to let the phone run its course and then die only a few months later. I know it is the quality of these stolen goods because I had the exact same model and it lasted for years.Then, they wanted to charge me to fix a phone that never should have broken in the first place.

STOLEN GOODS. ...I should've known better...

And these reviews have got to be written by the store owners. There is no way they are written by outside customers. I have even noticed as much from other customers coming in with unresolved issues.

originalText.text: I have been trying with so much energy to get my Ipads back, these guys are the worst, NO SUCCESS GETTING SIMPLE ANSWERS, VERY BAD SERVICE. Im waiting for one Ipad to be fixed, so I decided to come get the other one, but the women says its not there, but the guy told that it is there. Cannot get in contact with the owner. They wont tell me when things will be ready, its like your a bad person if you ask for information, I dont write bad reviews, but at this point I cant do business without the Ipad. I will NEVER BRING ANYTHIBG ELSE HERE, BAD EXPERIENCE ALL THE TIME. I have been back and forth for a while with absolutely nothing but FRUSTRATION.

originalText.text: They can fix your device really good 1st off leave it to them and they can fix it for you then just give them your number and they will text you when you're done

originalText.text: Honestly the customer service at this place is horrible. First in and first serviced doesn't exist there. People will come in after you and leave before you. I wish there was another UPS drop off closer to me. This will have to do for now.
